name: CubeGoPewPew (Alpha Preview)
description:
I shall make a 2D Platformer Shoot-em-up about a cube that shoots hostile cubes 

-Lucarkirb, 2021

One day, I decided to boot up unity and make a Platformer where you shoot cubes. 

This masterpiece is a work in progress and I do want to make this a fully-fledged game one day.

Controls
WASD- Movement

Left Mouse Button - Shoot da gun

R reload

W/Space - Jump
